message.content: {"given_definition_quality": 92, "better_definition": "Primary school student", "sentence": "小学生在学校。", "image_prompt": "A soft apocalypse animation-style scene showing a cheerful young primary school student standing in front of a simple school building under an overcast sky, with gentle muted colors. The mood is calm yet slightly surreal, with a sense of hopeful resilience in a changing world.", "sentence_translation": "The primary school student is at school."}
